```scss
// Property: behavior
// Description: Custom behavior the user notification supports.
// Component(s): Ti.App.iOS.UserNotificationAction
'.behavior-app[platform=ios]': { behavior: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_BEHAVIOR_DEFAULT }
'.behavior-app-textinput[platform=ios]': { behavior: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_BEHAVIOR_TEXTINPUT }
```
